thread.title: Iconic brand Technics will grace a new wave of turntables
thread.title_full: Iconic brand Technics will grace a new wave of turntables

title: Iconic brand Technics will grace a new wave of turntables
text: Iconic brand Technics will grace a new wave of turntables Thursday, 3 September 2015 (11 minutes ago) Panasonic revealed at IFA today that its iconic brand Technics will relaunch a series of turntables. The remade turntable features "direct drive motor control technology" that Panasonic says will improve sound quality.
